channel.title: SWS: 1%er Swoop Gang (one-shot)
channel.description:
*While Rich is stuck in temporary housing in downtown Minneapolis, he wants to run SOMETHING! So let's try a one-shot of an oldie, but a goodie.* ![](/uploads/default/original/2X/8/8c634baf7bbfe9fa9d10293130422916aff7ca45.jpeg)
**Live to Ride, Ride to Live!** ***** Play Outlaw Swoop Bikers in a Star Wars universe on the brink of Galactic War! Your swoop gang is the absolute Best of the Worst. - Commit crimes against the Empire - help charities and the downtrodden - hand out some good old fashioned street justice. Work under the Empire's radar and go toe to toe with your Rival Gang. Be cool, and when cool won't cut it, be karking awesome!
------------------------------------- This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that's Return of the Jedi) when the Empire was in control, Jedi were few and hunted, and the rebellion was growing in fits and starts. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries.
Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. [The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) will be in use as well as Roses and Thorns after each session.
This game session will be recorded. This session is scheduled for 3 hours.
[Session:](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LfmGf8nKsOqPjBUr_gq) [date=2019-06-22 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-06-22 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"]

item.title: SWS: 1%er Swoop Gang (one-shot)
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

While Rich is stuck in temporary housing in downtown Minneapolis, he wants to run SOMETHING! So let’s try a one-shot of an oldie, but a goodie.

Live to Ride, Ride to Live!

Play Outlaw Swoop Bikers in a Star Wars universe on the brink of Galactic War!
Your swoop gang is the absolute Best of the Worst.

  • Commit crimes against the Empire
  • help charities and the downtrodden
  • hand out some good old fashioned street justice.
    Work under the Empire’s radar and go toe to toe with your Rival Gang.
    Be cool, and when cool won’t cut it, be karking awesome!

This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that’s Return of the Jedi) when the Empire was in control, Jedi were few and hunted, and the rebellion was growing in fits and starts. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries.

Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy will be in play and safety tools X-Card will be in use as well as Roses and Thorns after each session.

This game session will be recorded.
This session is scheduled for 3 hours.

Session: Saturday, June 22, 2019 1:00 PM → Saturday, June 22, 2019 4:00 PM
